text: aur isake alaava jo shakhs khuda kee huramat vaalee cheezon kee taazeem karega to ye usake pavaradigaar ke yahaan usake haq mein behatar hai aur un jaanavaron ke alaava jo tumase bayaan kie jaanege kul chaarapae tumhaare vaaste halaal kie gae to tum naapaak buton se bache raho aur lago baaten gaane vagairah se bache raho
